import React,{useState}from'react';import axios from'axios';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import Will from'./Will';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function WillViewViewer(){const Navi=useNavigate();const[code,setCode]=useState('');const baseUrl='http://j10c208.p.ssafy.io:8080';const applyViewer=async()=>{if(code.trim()===''){alert('코드를 입력해주세요.');return;}const formData=new FormData();formData.append('willCode',code);try{const response=await axios.post("".concat(baseUrl,"/api/will/certificate"),formData,{headers:{'Content-Type':'multipart/form-data'}});if(response.status===200){// console.log('열람 성공:', response.data);
const userId=response.data.userId;const s3url=response.data.willFileAddress;Navi("/will/".concat(userId),{state:{s3url:s3url,'willCode':code}});console.log('열람 성공 : ',response.data.willFileAddress);}if(response.status===204){alert('유언장 코드를 확인해주세요.');}else{console.log('열람 오류:',response.status);}}catch(error){console.error('Error:',error);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:styles.container,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{style:styles.title,children:"\uC720\uC5B8\uC7A5 \uD655\uC778\uD558\uAE30"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{style:styles.subtitle,children:"\uC720\uC5B8\uC7A5\uC744 \uD655\uC778\uD558\uAE30 \uC704\uD574 \uC804\uB2EC \uBC1B\uC740 \uCF54\uB4DC\uB97C \uC785\uB825\uD574\uC8FC\uC138\uC694."}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"\uBCF4\uC548\uCF54\uB4DC",value:code,onChange:e=>setCode(e.target.value),style:styles.input}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:applyViewer,style:styles.button,children:"\uC81C\uCD9C\uD558\uAE30"})]});}const styles={container:{maxWidth:"600px",margin:"auto",textAlign:"center",padding:"20px"},title:{fontSize:"2rem",marginBottom:"20px",color:"#617C77"},subtitle:{fontSize:"1.2rem",marginBottom:"20px",color:"#99A799"},input:{width:"100%",padding:"10px",marginBottom:"20px",borderRadius:"5px",border:"1px solid #ADC2A9",boxSizing:"border-box"},button:{padding:"10px 20px",background:"#E4DCCF",color:"#000000",border:"none",borderRadius:"5px",cursor:"pointer",fontSize:"1rem",transition:"background 0.3s ease"}};export default WillViewViewer;
